mapper.insert: insert into survey_information ( survey_title, survey_content, participant_count, survey_status, create_date, update_date ) values ( #{survey_title}, #{survey_info}, 0, #{survey_status}, now(), now() );

insert into apply_information ( application_class, survey_class, survey_password, user_code, company_code, category_code, survey_target_gender, survey_target_age, survey_per_money, participant_max, survey_period_start, survey_period_stop ) values ( #{application_class}, #{survey_class}, #{survey_password}, #{user_code}, #{company_code}, #{category_code}, #{survey_target_gender}, #{survey_target_age}, #{survey_per_money}, #{participant_max}, #{survey_period_start}, #{survey_period_stop} )
mapper.select: select ai.survey_code, si.survey_title, ai.survey_per_money, ai.participant_max from apply_information ai left outer join survey_information si ON(ai.survey_code = si.survey_code) where ai.survey_code = #{survey_code}
